title: George Clooney | The Fasting And The Furious
description:
The GOP nominee for governor of Pennsylvania is taking extreme measures to boost his chances at the polls, and we’re feeling sorry for the guy who almost caught Aaron Judge’s history-making home run. And George Clooney stops by to talk about his new rom-com with Julia Roberts and The Clooney Foundation for Justice’s inaugural Albee Awards ceremony, which will honor journalists and other heroes who are fighting for justice and human rights around the world. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
